title: Baked raspberry cheesecake
description: Baked cheesecakes take time, but boy are they worth the effort. The tricky bit is waiting for it to cool fully before tucking in.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need a 23cm/9in springform tin, heavy-duty 46cm/18in wide aluminium foil and a large, high-sided roasting tin.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, sliced lengthways and seeds scraped out
